text: St James' Park is a football stadium in Newcastle, England. It is the current home stadium of Newcastle United. ==International matches== Date Result Competition 18 March 1901 6–0 British Home Championship 6 April 1907 1–1 British Home Championship 15 November 1933 1–2 British Home Championship 9 November 1938 4–0 Friendly 10 June 1996 0–1 Euro 1996 13 June 1996 1–0 Euro 1996 18 June 1996 3–1 Euro 1996 5 September 2001 2–0 World Cup 2002 Qualifying 18 August 2004 3–0 Friendly 30 March 2005 2–0 World Cup 2006 Qualifying St.James' Park hosted three matches of the Euro 1996 and also hosted some matches during the 2012 Olympic Games and for the 2015 Rugby World Cup. ==Other uses== The stadium was used by many great musicians like The Rolling Stones, Bruce Springsteen & The E Street Band, Queen, Bob Dylan, Bryan Adams & Rod Stewart, among others. title: St James' Park
